Title: motion10 SharePoint Twitter Status Notes Control
Description: Change the normal SharePoint Status control to the motion10 SharePoint Twitter Status Notes Control and you can send your tweets to Twitter!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The motion10 SharePoint Twitter Status Notes Control allow users to update their status in SharePoint and sends the message automatically to Twitter.

  • View the blog post.
  • View the documentation.
  • Download the SharePoint Solution Package.
